Uses of Package
jGame.core.entity.render

Packages that use jGame.core.entity.render
Package Description
jGame.core.entity
This package contains all classes required for proper construction of any entity and correct updating/rendering.
jGame.core.entity.render
Package containing all render focused classes for entities.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity.render used by jGame.core.entity
    Class Description
    Sprite
    This class acts as a way of displaying custom entity visuals, supporting animations for said entities.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity.render used by jGame.core.entity.render
    Class Description
    Animation
    Class responsible for performing animations on entity sprites: rolling through a series of images, thus creating the illusion of animation.
